reviewText: Mary is a born leader of dance!!! Delivered as promised!!

If you want to learn to dance and have fun at the same time this is the lady to learn from. Mary knows her stuff and has won innumerable competition titles to prove it. Mary's instruction is responsible for many of her students winning competitions themselves; my husband and myself among them. Learning from a knowledgeable and charismatic instructor who clearly loves what she does - what more could you ask for?  Follow Mary's instruction and you'll command the dance floor yourself!

In this, the newest dance instructional videotape from National Grand Champion and top 5 world contender, Mary Hoedeman, youll learn the Five Fundamental Basics for dancing Two Step, West Coast swing, Night Club and Cha Cha.

In addition youll learn about the 18 techniques for making your dancing more enjoyable and more beautiful. As a BONUS Mary has also included some advanced moves. Learn the content of this videotape and youll be creating your own sensation when you next step on the dance floor.

Follow Mary Hoedeman The Beauty (and fun) of Dance is Only a Step Away!

I like dancing and this dvd has helped me get better at it.  It is a very easy to follow and I look forward to practice with it.  My husbandd
like too and he is also learning to dance with it.
